reviews.text: Beautiful rose garden, well maintained. Do come on weekends. Its located in sector 15. Space for car parking also available. You can enjoy coconut water, various flavor of ice creams, lemon soda. Best time to visit is in evening as it glows various colour full lights there. Lot of fountains with ample sitting space. Best for jogging yoga exercise, whatever you love to do.

The Rose Garden as the name suggest has different varieties of roses white , red, Yellow, orange,pink with a specific scientific name written...
The sizes of roses are also very Big.
The park is large and spread over 30 acres..
The garden is well maintained with good grass..
The trees also beautiful..
It also has a fountain..

Good to spend time here
Moreover eating facilities and washrooms are also available..
A Nala passes in between the park and has bridge to cross over it..

My mom used to come here when she lived in Chandigarh for a while. When I visited, it was nice. However, i noticed that the water (lake) was drained. It did not look very aesthetic. Wish they were fixing it at a different time. The flowers look very beautiful. If you are in Chandigarh, I recommend visiting this garden. It is also a great place for studying or reading (or relaxing in general). I just want to put out a request for people to not damage the flowers and plants. If you are taking photos, please be aware of your surroundings. This is a beautiful place, and we should keep it this way.

Visited during summer vacations and hardly found any rose. Summer definitely not the right time to visit the garden. There is not much greenery also to sit during summer. Recommended for other seasons. Kids did not enjoy much and all we could see was little squirrel 🐿 at entrance. Must be much better place during season other than summer.

Opened in 1967, this place has been one of the scenic beauty types place where you can visit anytime for nice views. The garden is well managed by the managing body. Also if you are one who is very fond of roses and would like to take a look at different varieties of roses, then this is the place for you. Also during the time of valentine's week, there is a rose festival organised here. So visit this place during this time and you will definitely worth it. For the rest of the year, this place is chic and quiet. So a good place for finding peaceful environment for a short time in a day or so

We came for dinner and it was excellent. 
We made reservations and we were not disappointed. It was so incredibly good and we are so full! You will not be dissatisfied in the meal or service! Be sure to make a reservation because this place gets easily crowded especially on weekends!
Best waiters ever! Full of historical facts about movie stars that have dined there. Food was phenomenal.  Bella 🤩
Food was great.   Bar tender was conversational and polite
The food is good and tasty! Had the red sauce pasta with shrimp and my sister got the chicken fettuccine, they use such big plate that makes the portion so little. Dessert was good too.
Best steak in town really enjoyed atmosphere service was great should make reservations

I have seen many beautiful churches, cathedrals and monasteries all around the world, but gosh, this one beats them all! It was so stunning and awesome, literally took my breath away. I guess I will just let my photos do the talking because now words can describe the beauty I saw in this place!!

Amazing cathedral with a rich interior what is full of frescoes, tapestry, beautiful old icons, modelings and carved wooden furniture. It is the most beautiful church where u have ever been! Also you can listen a history of that place
There’s a lot to see in this part of Bergamo! The old town is one of a kind. Love it!
Very nice place, visit it;) entrance is Free and you must absolutely see it inside!
Serine and peaceful...go to Bergamo, it’s worth the trip. Beautiful old city.

The Capuchin monastery with the Finding of the Holy Cross Church in Brno is a unique monument which will inspire every lover of history and art. In the original early Baroque building you can admire the valuable Capuchin library with the original Rococo inventory and a ceiling fresco by Josef Stern. Anyone who likes spooky experiences will certainly want to head to the cellar of the monastery, which offers a rarity of European importance – a Capuchin crypt from the 18th century where the naturally mummified remains of members of the Capuchin order, their patrons and prominent personalities of Brno lie.
Very nice tour which is self-paced. This one of the touristic site you want to visit when you are on Brno.
Navštívili jsme v rámci stoletého výročí republiky, čímž nám byl umožněn vstup do ne běžně přístupných míst kláštera (např. pozoruhodné knihovny). Moc pěkná památka se zajímavou historií.
Lo mejor de Bnro

Капуцинский монастырь в Брно появился в 17 веке. Современное здание монастыря соорудили в 18 столетии. Храм знаменит своей криптой, в которой захоронены 150 монахов, из них сохранилось 24 мумифицированных тела.   Здание выполнено в стиле зрелого барокко, однако не отличается излишними архитектурными элементами. На террасе выставлены шесть скульптур, почитаемых копуцинами святых.
Nice friendly staff. Great food. Good lunchtime special set menu along with the option of the main menu

Loved it, the pate was nice but the main was superb (Pasta with Scallops, Spanish Sausage, Black Pudding & White wine sauce). 
Only issue was one of our group ordered an Eton Mess for dessert but brought a Sundae instead & when told that wasn't what we ordered, it was still put in front of him .. but it's certainly didn't spoil the meal.
A lovely setting to, with a great view of the Princess Sq. Christmas tree.

We arrived at a very busy time but they managed to find us a table fairly quickly. The service was friendly but a little slow. I think due to not enough staff. The food was delicious and worth the wait. Will come back the next time I'm in the city centre looking for an energy boost.

Great meal, I'm vegan had the arribiata  with side of spinach, really delicious.Wee bit disappointing there was no non dairy milk options, was looking forward to a coffee, hopefully have it next time I visit, would definitely return, the whole family enjoyed their meals, service was good too.
Fantastic afternoon to celebrate a friend's 70th birthday. Great food and service & will definitely be back.
